document_data.name: Rothglar Illance
document_data.mainbody: '''Rothglar Illance''' was a heir of House [[Illance]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He showed more self-control when his father was around.
document_data.Relationships: He was the eldest son of [[Velyandra Illance]] and [[Daeclander Illance]], and had stretched the man's patience as far as it would go. Rothglar had eight brothers, per [[Arclath Delcastle]]. He had made a rival of Marlin Stormserpent. His bodyguard was named [[Marlazander]] the Mighty.
document_data.History:
Rothglar attended a feast in early [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, in which he was seen by [[Amarune Whitewave]] listening close into some private converse.

Before the night when [[Marlin Stormserpent]] retrieved the ''[[Wyverntongue Chalice]]'' from the Royal Palace of [[Suzail]], he'd bribed [[Verrin]], one of Marlin's servants, and the disloyal man waited for Marlin at the end of the passage the latter used to get out of the castle. Marlazander was there with him; they had not unlocked the gate and were waiting for him. Marlin killed them too quickly, even from behind the bars, to learn what their intentions had been.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|128|12}}
document_data.Rumors & Legends: There was a rumor, actually a manipulation by Marlin Stormserpent, that Rothglar, alongside [[Harmond Hawklin]] and [[Seszgar Huntcrown]], were planning to unleash a some sort of "ball of [[Spellplague]]" from a chest during the [[Council of the Dragon]].{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|84|8}}
